desc: Home of hand knit MUJKA crochet dolls. Handmade fair trade crochet dolls based on MUJKA characters. Amigurumi dolls are hand crafted with love in south East Turkey with organic yarn.

layout.text: A super chic companion featuring Paris fashion, ripped denim, pink chucks & trendy furry jacket.
Select from 4 different hair colors & matching products.
